message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with a problem related to natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision (CV), specifically the task of correcting inaccurate words in textual descriptions of videos. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also proposes a deep network that leverages the semantic interdependence of videos and words, which suggests a possible connection to CV (Computer Vision). Additionally, the paper uses both Convolutional N-Grams and LSTMs, which are common techniques in machine learning and deep learning, indicating a possible connection to cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper deals with text data and proposes an approach to automatically construct a large dataset, which suggests a possible connection to cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
